data: m a m b a t t a
d i b a t t a
m a n d e ŋ ŋ e q
d i d e ŋ ŋ e q
m a ŋ i d a ŋ
d i i d a ŋ
m a p p a s u ŋ
d i p a s u ŋ
m a t t u n u
d i t u n u
m a s s i r a q
d i s i r a q
m a t t i m b e
d i t i m b e
m a p p a n d e
d i p a n d e
notes: Place and manner of articulation for m, b, p, f, n, d, t, s, š, ŋ, g, k. Vowels: a, e, i, o, u; Consonants: m, n, ŋ, b, d, g, j, r, l, ǰ, w, y, p, t, k, f, s, ʃ, h, q, č; Nasals: m, n, ŋ; Voiced Consonants: b, d, g, j, r, l, ǰ, w, y, m, n, ŋ; Voiceless Consonants: p, t, k, f, s, š, h, q, č.
